#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
ll gcd(ll a,ll b)
{
    if(b==0)
        return a;
    return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
   ll t,n,m,x,y,num,denum,g;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
       cin>>n>>m;
       x=(n/2)*((m+1)/2);
       y=((n+1)/2)*(m/2);
       num=x+y;
       denum=n*m;
       g=gcd(denum,num);
       cout<<num/g<<"/"<<denum/g<<'\n';
   }
   return 0;
}
